attributes.action: Help Sergeant Michael Anderson get the Full Service Pension he deserves
attributes.additional_details:
Sergeant Michael Anderson, 35, of the Royal Dragoon Guards, was within THREE DAYS of claiming a lifetime pension deal worth £261,278 for EIGHTEEN YEARS service.

Instead, he is to receive a "redundancy package" of only £87,417 when he turns 60!

He will miss out on almost £175,000 because his job was axed just 72 HOURS before he was due his Lifetime Pension!

He has earned that pension, and should receive it!
